dashboard.title: Dashboard
listing.listing_limit: You've reached your listing limit. Purchase more slots to list more items.
listing.title: Title
listing.meetup_placeholder: e.g. Commonwealth View (Blks 89-91 Tanglin Halt Road)
listing.meetup_help: If you want to meet up for the sale, add the location here.
listing.image_optional: Image (optional, leave empty to keep current)
settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile and account settings
settings.profile_description: Update your name, email, phone and address
settings.payment_description: Manage how you pay and get paid
profile.name: Full name
profile.resend_verification: Click here to resend the verification email.
profile.verification_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
logout.title: Log out
logout.message: Are you sure you want to log out? You will need to sign in again to access your account.
payment.no_methods: No payment methods saved. Add one to use at checkout.
payment.no_cards: No cards saved. Add a card to use at checkout.
payment.add_myanmar: Add MPU Debit Card, KBZ Pay, AYA Pay, Wave Pay or CB Pay
confirm_password.title: Confirm your password
confirm_password.description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
password.update_description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
payment.stripe_env_hint: Add STRIPE_KEY and STRIPE_SECRET to .env to enable card management for Singapore.
payment.region_not_configured: Payment method is not configured for your region yet.
orders.no_orders_description: Your orders will appear here after you complete a purchase.
twofa.heading: Two-Factor Authentication
twofa.enabled_description: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
twofa.disabled_description: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.
twofa.recovery_description: Recovery codes let you regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
twofa.regenerate_warning: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click Regenerate Codes above.
twofa.verify_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
twofa.enabled_modal_description: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
twofa.enable_modal_description: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app
